item.title: Run Terraform with remote TFE backend in Azure DevOps Pipeline
item.description: Run Terraform with remote TFE backend in Azure DevOps Pipeline Background Recently I worked in a project in large enterprise cloud migration project which using Azure DevOps Pipeline (YAML) as the core CD/CI pipeline which integrate Github repository as the source of truth, Terraform Enterprise workspace performing the IaC workload and Azure AD for IAM. There are a number of benefits: Cloud-native approach with Terraform with massive number of providers
